law.history: Repealed 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 146, effective July 1, 1982. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 147, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 338, effective January 2, 1978. -- Repealed in part 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 167, secs. 9 and 21. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2149, 2152.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Jurisdiction of district courts over incompetent persons and their committees -- Bond of committee -- Waiver of Bond.
metadata.note: 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 396, sec. 150 would have repealed this section effective July 1, 1982. However, 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 396 was repealed by 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 146, also effective July 1, 1982.
